summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2157, for the improvement of 10th Avenue from Yesler Way to East Spring Street; 11th Avenue, from Yesler Way to East Marion Street; East Fir Street, from Broadway to 12th Avenue; East Alder Street, from 10th Avenue to 12th Avenue; and East James Street, from Broadway to 11th Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon; under Ordinance No. 21616 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
